official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations requiring locomotives and rear cars to be equipped with bulletproof glass.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Railroad Safety Act of 1970 to require the Secretary of Transportation to promulgate regulations requiring that the glass in all exposed windows in the locomotives and rear cars of all passenger and freight trains be bulletproof.
